articles.author: Phil Casey
articles.title: Resting Rory and Bryson v Brooks impact: Five key Ryder Cup talking points - Independent.ie
articles.description: Europe will attempt to retain the Ryder Cup when they take on the United States at Whistling Straits from September 24-26.
articles.content:
Europe will attempt to retain the Ryder Cup when they take on the United States at Whistling Straits from September 24-26.
